org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops

Class BaseOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.BaseOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Op
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseAccumulation, BaseScalarOp, BaseTransformOp

    public abstract class BaseOp
extends java.lang.Object
implements Op
    Base op. An op involves iterating over 2 buffers (x,y) up to n elements and applying a transform or accumulating a result.

    • Constructor Summary
